title: SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Scientist D Posts
description: The Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology (SCTIMST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Scientist D Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, MD/MS, DNB, PGDM, and Ph. D. can apply for the SCTIMST Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply online mode. Here we have mentioned the education detai...
